[[Boomerang (Southeast Asia TV channel)]] | subsid = | homepage = | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Turner Broadcasting System Asia Pacific, Inc.''' is Turner's Asian branch. The company operates multiple channels across Asia.[http://www.casbaadirectory.com/regional/broadcaster/turner-broadcasting-system-asia-pacific-inc--s-1560-c-.html][http://hongkong.recruit.net/company-turner+broadcasting+system+asia+pacific+inc.-jobs][http://www.casbaa.com/media-and-resources/news-center/members-news/986-turner-broadcasting-launches-trutv-in-asia] ==Channels== * [[Cartoon Network (Taiwan)]] * [[Cartoon Network (Korea)]] * [[Turner Classic Movies (Asia)]] * [[Cartoon Network (Japan)]] * [[truTV (Asia)]] * [[CNN International Asia Pacific]] * [[Cartoon Network (India)]] * [[Cartoon Network (Pakistan)]] * [[Cartoon Network (Philippines)]] * [[China Entertainment Television]] * [[WB Channel]] * [[CNN-IBN]] * [[CNN|CNN Japan]] * [[Imagine Showbiz]] * [[Imagine TV]] * [[Lumiere Movies]] * [[Boomerang (Southeast Asia TV channel)]] * [[Pogo (TV channel)]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.cartoonnetwork.com.tw/ Cartoon Network (Taiwan] * [http://www.cartoonnetworkasia.com/ Cartoon Network (Southeast Asia)] * [http://www.cartoonnetwork.com.ph/ Cartoon Network (Philippines)] * [http://cetv.com/ China Entertainment Television] * [http://www.cnn.co.jp/ CNN Japan] * [http://www.cartoonnetworkindia.com/ Cartoon Network (India)] * [http://www.trutv.asia/ truTV Asia] {{Turner Broadcasting System}} {{Turner Broadcasting System Asia Pacific}} {{Time Warner}} [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System]] [[Category:Time Warner]] [[Category:Turner Broadcasting System Asia Pacific]] [[Category:Southeast Asian media]]
